hero.title: I am a creative frontend developer

profile.title: profile
profile.block:
I am a creative and detail oriented front-end developer with experience within back-end and design. I focus on the visual part of web development and enjoy being part of the creative process.

I am a problem solver with a specific interest in the process from idea to the final product with a mission to always find the best solutions.

I am a perfectionist and therefore always work to improve and optimize the quality of my work.

My ambition is to work with a company that is interested in strengthening the competences of its employees and that prioritizes social networking, humor and cooperation.

job0.title: Front-end developer
